channel.title: Manager on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Manager on SpiderSoft

item.title: Mac OS X Window Manager
item.description: I was looking for some kind of easy to use Window Manager for Mac OS X. Usually I’m working on multiple screen with multiple application open (usually it’s between 4-8). It’s really hard to organise everything in proper order and placement. Arranging windows it’s slow, especially when you need to compare or see results on multiple window at once.
